On such soft soil like a flower field,"},{"lineNumber":61173,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見落としようがないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"there's no way to overlook it.\""},{"lineNumber":61174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、よ、よかったぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, t-that's a relief...\""},{"lineNumber":61175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ったくツメの甘いやつめ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good grief, such a careless one."},{"lineNumber":61176,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあいい、いくぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, whatever, let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":61177,"originalJapaneseLine":"耳障りな音を無視して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignoring the irritating noise,"},{"lineNumber":61178,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は花畑の中央へと進んでいった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others proceeded into the center of the flower field."},{"lineNumber":61179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「工場…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Factory...\""},{"lineNumber":61180,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くくく……それっぽい所が見つかったではないか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh heh... We've found a place that looks like it!"},{"lineNumber":61181,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よしいくぞ！　突撃だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's go! Charge!\""},{"lineNumber":61182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa...\""},{"lineNumber":61183,"originalJapaneseLine":"少年の魔人は、陶然とした表情で","translatedEnglishLine":"The young demon, with a blissful expression,"},{"lineNumber":61184,"originalJapaneseLine":"仕切りの向こうの物体を眺めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"gazed at the object beyond the partition."},{"lineNumber":61185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「絶対に……治してあげる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will definitely... fix you."},{"lineNumber":61186,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もうすぐなんだ……待っててね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Very soon... just wait.\""},{"lineNumber":61187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――姉さん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Sister.\""},{"lineNumber":61188,"originalJapaneseLine":"呟いた瞬間、部屋の向こうから","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment he muttered, from beyond the room,"},{"lineNumber":61189,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱入してくる人影があった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a figure suddenly charged in."},{"lineNumber":61190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははははは！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!!"},{"lineNumber":61191,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見つけたぞクソガキ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gotcha, you little brat!\""},{"lineNumber":61192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ……人間？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh... a human?\""},{"lineNumber":61193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほ、ホントにいたぁ…………よかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-there really was someone... thank goodness...\""},{"lineNumber":61194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よくここが分かったね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You really figured out this place well..."},{"lineNumber":61195,"originalJapaneseLine":"　けど、消えなよ。僕は今、大事なところなんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But disappear. I'm at an important point right now.\""},{"lineNumber":61196,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう聞いては捨て置けんな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hearing that, I can't just stand by."},{"lineNumber":61197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これ以上ヤバイ兵器を作られる前に、叩き殺す！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Before they make any more dangerous weapons, I'll smash you!\""},{"lineNumber":61198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しつこいなぁ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're so persistent...!"},{"lineNumber":61199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　邪魔――――するなッ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't interfere!!\""},{"lineNumber":61200,"originalJapaneseLine":"主の苛立ちに応えるように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if responding to their master's irritation,"},{"lineNumber":61201,"originalJapaneseLine":"周辺からわらわらと人形が現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"dolls swarmed out from the surroundings."},{"lineNumber":61202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、今がチャンスなのだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, now's our chance!"},{"lineNumber":61203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　叩き潰すぞ！　ガキを絶対逃がすな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Smash them! Don't let that kid escape!\""},{"lineNumber":61204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どぉぉぉおおお、りゃあああああああ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Dooooooo, ryaaahhhhh!!\""},{"lineNumber":61205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ッ…………が、は……くぁ……ああぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... ga, ha... kwa... aah...\""},{"lineNumber":61206,"originalJapaneseLine":"ざっくりと、カオスの刃が","translatedEnglishLine":"With a deep slash, the Chaos blade"},{"lineNumber":61207,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールの胴を捉え、抉った。","translatedEnglishLine":"caught and gouged Paiar's torso."},{"lineNumber":61208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にょほほほほほほほ！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nyohohohohoho!!"},{"lineNumber":61209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もーーーーらったよーーーーーん！","translatedEnglishLine":"I've got youuuuuu!"},{"lineNumber":61210,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ苦しめ悶えろ！　カカカカ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now suffer and writhe! Kakakaka!\""},{"lineNumber":61211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ば、かな、っ……そんな、っ……うそ、だ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Im-Impossible... that... can't be true..."},{"lineNumber":61212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな、所で、ぼくは……ねぇ、さん……っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"In a place like this, I... sister...\""},{"lineNumber":61213,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後まで口にすることもなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without finishing those words,"},{"lineNumber":61214,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールの小さな身体は床に倒れ伏した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Paiar's small body collapsed onto the floor."},{"lineNumber":61215,"originalJapaneseLine":"際限がないかと思われるほどに、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if without end,"},{"lineNumber":61216,"originalJapaneseLine":"床の血溜まりが瞬く間に広がっていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"the pool of blood on the floor quickly spread."},{"lineNumber":61217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねえ、さん……ねぇさん、ねぇさん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sister... sister, sister..."},{"lineNumber":61218,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぼ、くの……ねぇ、撫でてよ……ほめてよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"My... sister, pet me... praise me..."},{"lineNumber":61219,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぼく、がんば、って…………","translatedEnglishLine":"I tried my best..."},{"lineNumber":61220,"originalJapaneseLine":"ずるずると、這いずって仕切りの向こうの部屋へと","translatedEnglishLine":"Slowly, dragging himself, he crawled toward the room beyond the partition"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほら、これ。花畑みたいな軟らかい土じゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Look, this. On such soft soil like a flower field,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見落としようがないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no way to overlook it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、よ、よかったぁ……」
「ったくツメの甘いやつめ。
まあいい、いくぞ」
耳障りな音を無視して、
ランス達は花畑の中央へと進んでいった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others proceeded into the center of the flower field.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くくく……それっぽい所が見つかったではないか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh heh... We've found a place that looks like it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よしいくぞ！　突撃だ！」
少年の魔人は、陶然とした表情で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The young demon, with a blissful expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕切りの向こうの物体を眺めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gazed at the object beyond the partition.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「絶対に……治してあげる。
もうすぐなんだ……待っててね」
呟いた瞬間、部屋の向こうから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment he muttered, from beyond the room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱入してくる人影があった。
「がはははははははは！！
見つけたぞクソガキ！」
「あれ……人間？」
「ほ、ホントにいたぁ…………よかった……」
「よくここが分かったね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You really figured out this place well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けど、消えなよ。僕は今、大事なところなんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But disappear. I'm at an important point right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう聞いては捨て置けんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hearing that, I can't just stand by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以上ヤバイ兵器を作られる前に、叩き殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before they make any more dangerous weapons, I'll smash you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しつこいなぁ……！
邪魔――――するなッ！！」
主の苛立ちに応えるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if responding to their master's irritation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周辺からわらわらと人形が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dolls swarmed out from the surroundings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、今がチャンスなのだ！
叩き潰すぞ！　ガキを絶対逃がすな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Smash them! Don't let that kid escape!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どぉぉぉおおお、りゃあああああああ！！」
ざっくりと、カオスの刃が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a deep slash, the Chaos blade

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの胴を捉え、抉った。
「にょほほほほほほほ！！
もーーーーらったよーーーーーん！
さあ苦しめ悶えろ！　カカカカ！」
「ば、かな、っ……そんな、っ……うそ、だ……
こんな、所で、ぼくは……ねぇ、さん……っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a place like this, I... sister..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後まで口にすることもなく、
パイアールの小さな身体は床に倒れ伏した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paiar's small body collapsed onto the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 際限がないかと思われるほどに、
床の血溜まりが瞬く間に広がっていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the pool of blood on the floor quickly spread.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねえ、さん……ねぇさん、ねぇさん……
ぼ、くの……ねぇ、撫でてよ……ほめてよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My... sister, pet me... praise me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼく、がんば、って…………
ずるずると、這いずって仕切りの向こうの部屋へと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Slowly, dragging himself, he crawled toward the room beyond the partition

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
